executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse cursor horizontally while avoiding asteroids and UFOs falling from the top of the screen. The game includes star collection for points, collision detection for game over, and progressive difficulty increase every 10 seconds.

tasks.description: Create HTML structure and basic styling
tasks.requirements: Set up the main HTML file with canvas element for game rendering, score display, and game over screen. Include basic CSS styling for space theme with dark background.
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads properly with canvas element visible and styled appropriately

tasks.description: Initialize game canvas and basic game loop
tasks.requirements: Set up HTML5 canvas context, implement requestAnimationFrame game loop, and basic canvas clearing functionality
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas renders and game loop runs at 60fps without errors

tasks.requirements: Create player object with rocket emoji (🚀), implement horizontal mouse following movement, and render player on canvas
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket follows mouse cursor horizontally and stays within canvas bounds

tasks.requirements: Implement object spawning system that creates asteroids (☄️), UFOs (🛸), and stars (⭐) at random positions at the top of screen. Objects should fall downward at high speed.
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly at top and move downward at consistent speed, despawning when they exit screen

tasks.requirements: Create collision detection between player rocket and all falling objects. Detect collisions with asteroids/UFOs for game over and stars for point collection.
tasks.test_criteria: Collisions are accurately detected between player and objects with appropriate responses

tasks.requirements: Add score tracking that increases by 50 points when collecting stars. Display current score on screen and update in real-time.
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when star is collected and displays correctly on screen

tasks.requirements: Handle game over state when player collides with asteroids or UFOs. Stop game loop, display game over screen with final score and restart option.
tasks.test_criteria: Game ends immediately upon collision with harmful objects, shows game over screen with score

tasks.requirements: Add timer that increases game speed every 10 seconds by increasing object fall speed and spawn rate to make the game progressively harder.
tasks.test_criteria: Game speed noticeably increases every 10 seconds making objects fall faster

tasks.requirements: Implement restart button and functionality to reset game state, score, and difficulty back to initial values when game over screen is shown.
tasks.test_criteria: Game can be restarted from game over screen and all values reset properly

tasks.requirements: Test all game mechanics, ensure smooth performance, fix any bugs, and optimize for different screen sizes and browsers.
tasks.test_criteria: Game runs smoothly without errors, all features work as specified, responsive design works on different screen sizes

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML entry point, CSS styling, and JavaScript game logic
